titleStmt.title: The lybeller carracterizd [sic], or a hue and cry sent after him. Some of his works made publick: with observations thereupon
titleStmt.author: Key, Leonard.
Coale, Benjamin. aut

notesStmt.note: Text signed on p. 2: Benj. Coales. Signed at end: Leonard Key.
Place of publication from Wing; dated at end: 2d. of the 2d. month, 1684.
Reproduction of the original in the Friends' House Library, London.
